document_data.name: ''Red Ruin''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Red Ruin''''' was a huge [[enchanted]] [[greataxe]] that once was wielded by the famous gladiator from [[Hillsfar Arena]] - [[Red Minotaur]].
document_data.Powers: The ''Red Ruin'' was enchanted with a deadly ''+4'' ''[[keen]]'' edge that dealt devastating slashing damage, significantly more dangerous than [[axe]]s of similar size.
document_data.History: Before [[1373 DR]], the ''Red Ruin'' earned fame in the hands of the Red Minotaur, the gladiator Champion of [[Hillsfar]] in the [[Moonsea]] region. After the [[minotaur]] was defeated in battle by the [[Hero of Daggerford]], the greataxe was taken from the Red Minotaur by an unknown person and sold for a hefty sum of [[coin]]s. Later, the magic weapon ended up in the hands of [[Zhentarim]] agents stationed in [[Iyrauroth]]'s swamps of [[Thar]].
